arts.ttl: Norwich City vs West Bromwich Albion: EFL Championship Preview, Gameweek 8, 2025/26
arts.sum: Currently sitting in eighth place, one point shy of Preston North End in the final play-off spot, Wednesday’s trip to Norfolk serves as a chance for Mason’s men to banish their recent blip and move into the top six as the Championship pauses for the two-week October international break. Liam Manning’s side have been second best in almost every game so far this season, and if not for the heroics of Harry Darling and Vladan Kovačević, would likely still be without a league win.

arts.ttl: Norwich vs West Brom predictions: Promotion hopefuls may cancel each other out
arts.sum: Neither Norwich nor West Brom's seasons have truly got going and Jack Ogalbe foresees them playing out a draw on Wednesday.

arts.ttl: Styles starts: West Brom team news and predicted XI to face Norwich City
arts.sum: The latest West Brom team news and predicted XI as Ryan Mason's side gear up to face Norwich City in the Championship. The post Styles starts: West Brom team news and predicted XI to face Norwich City appeared first on The72 - Football League News.
